DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy safety rabeprazole compare placebo Japanese subject Functional Dyspepsia .
DOC.brief_title: A Study E3810 Japanese Subjects With Functional Dyspepsia ( SAMURAI Study : Suppression Acid Milieu With Rabeprazole Improving Functional Dyspepsia ) ( Study E3810-J081-204 )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Participants diagnose Functional Dyspepsia accord Rome III criterion . Exclusion criterion : Participants neuropsychiatric disorder . Participants diagnose irritable bowel syndrome , inflammatory bowel disease serious constipation .
